unnormalised: Athlete biographies are my favourite! Just finished reading about Milkha Singh, truly inspiring. Remember watching *Bhaag Milkha Bhaag*? Goosebumps! Hoping someone writes about Dutee Chand soon, such a fighter. Maybe a book on some great kabaddi players too, representing India at the Asian Games. Imagine the struggles training in villages, aiming for that gold. Also, would love to read about the coaches from NIS Patiala who shape these champions. The dedication is next level. They go above and beyond.

Imagine the struggles training in villages, aiming for that gold. Also, would love to read about the coaches from N I S Patiala who shape these champions. The dedication is next level.
